product_name: Patagonia Strider PRO Shorts - Men's 5" Inseam
long_description: Rely on the men's Strider PRO Shorts with 5 in. inseam from Patagonia to enhance your comfort while running with their ultralight, quick-drying polyester and breathable mesh panels. Quick-drying, stretchy fabric provides air circulation and moisture management, and mesh panels enhance breathability; fabric is partially recycled. Shell fabric features a durable water repellent finish that causes light moisture to bead up and roll off. Moisture-wicking, quick drying liner shorts offer a comfortable fit without being too tight; liner shorts resist odors thanks to a permanent treatment. Patagonia Strider PRO shorts offer a regular fit that won't bind or chafe. Elastic drawcord waist personalizes fit; internal drop-in pocket on back hip; reflective logo on left hem for visibility.
short_description: Rely on the men's Strider PRO Shorts with 5 in. inseam from Patagonia to enhance your comfort while running with their ultralight, quick-drying polyester and breathable mesh panels.
